{
  "name": "pinuy-binuy-analyzer",
  "version": "4.29.0",
  "description": "Investment analyzer for Pinuy Binuy (Urban Renewal) projects in Israel",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node start.js",
    "dev": "node start.js",
    "db:migrate": "node src/db/migrate.js",
    "db:seed": "node src/db/seed.js",
    "db:reset": "node src/db/migrate.js && node src/db/seed.js",
    "scan": "node src/jobs/weeklyScanner.js",
    "test": "echo \"No tests yet\""
  },
  "build": "2026-02-20-v4.29.0-iai-v3-6axis-scoring",
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "pg": "^8.12.0",
    "node-cron": "^3.0.3",
    "axios": "^1.7.2",
    "cheerio": "^1.0.0",
    "dotenv": "^16.4.5",
    "winston": "^3.13.0",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "express-rate-limit": "^7.2.0",
    "nodemailer": "^6.9.13",
    "resend": "^3.2.0",
    "xml2js": "^0.6.2",
    "puppeteer-core": "^22.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "nodemon": "^3.1.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
